snippet.title: Armed man flees Coast bank empty handed
snippet.content: A MAN has been arrested after he allegedly tried to rob a Coast bank by knife point yesterday afternoon. The man, 37, will appear in the Maroochy Magistrates Court this morning charged with attempted robbery and possession of a knife in a public place. Police allege he entered a bank on Lowe St, Nambour about 1pm and demanded cash, but fled empty handed and was arrested on Ann St where a knife was found in his possession. No one was injured.
